https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/abFpALrtrVJ8JmHGKaXRx7SYjDo.jpg A humble Romanian actor in his 40's, hardly surviving between a complicated part in a musical, a depressed wife, and the obsession of an imminent, devastating earthquake, becomes the victim of his manipulative father. 6.9 on the Richter Scale
